name: salty-utility
description: Utility for processing bording school menus
preGenerateCommands: rdmd --eval="auto dir=environment.get(\"DUB_PACKAGE_DIR\"); auto gitVer = (\"git -C \"~dir~\" describe --tags\").executeShell; (gitVer.status == 0 ? gitVer.output.strip : \"v\" ~ dir.dirName.baseName.findSplitAfter(environment.get(\"DUB_ROOT_PACKAGE\")~\"-\")[1]).ifThrown(\"0.0.0\").chain(newline).to!string.toFile(dir.buildPath(\"version.txt\"));"
